During a visit by Danish Prime Minister Meta Fredriksson, President Zelensky again stressed the urgency for promised weapons to be supplied more quickly.

sentences.sentence: The president of Belarus, Alexander Lukashenko, traveled to Harare on Monday for talks with his Zimbabwean counterpart, Emerson Manangagwa, as both leaders attempt to further their diplomatic

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: ties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The two nations have faced Western sanctions, Zimbabwe for human rights concerns and Belarus for its support of Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The pressure from some sections of the international community has helped bring the two nations together. It is just that the West remains, you know, determined to punish our two countries, but they will not succeed because the development strategies of the two countries is to ensure that we are self-sufficient.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The two leaders hope to strengthen ties in mining, agriculture and politics, according to Zimbabwe's foreign ministry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: The number of people who have been killed in a suicide bombing in Pakistan has risen to at least 80.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Most of the victims were police officers who were praying in a mosque in Peshawar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Pakistan's Prime Minister Shabazz Sharif has visited the wounded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some were suffering from burns, others had broken bones from being hit by falling rubble.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The mosque is in one of the most heavily controlled areas of the city, which includes police headquarters and intelligence and counter-terrorism bureaus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Pakistani Taliban has denied involvement after an initial claim by one of its commanders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Eurostar is intentionally leaving hundreds of tickets unsold on peak time trains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's because border police can't process passports quickly enough on the first services between London and the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A direct consequence of the more rigorous passport checks required since Brexit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's particularly frustrating when you're someone who didn't hope to leave Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And I think it's really important, especially to my generation, didn't hope to leave Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And I think it's really important, especially to my generation, to be able to travel freely. I'm travelling for work today, so it makes a big difference to my ability to do my job in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And it's a real shame.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: What have you noticed? What's the difference?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The queues are much longer at the passport controls. There's actually much more separation of people. So if you have a UK passport versus if you have a European passport, there's a clear distinction where you're going.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And the lines are like wait.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: With a French passport, personally I have a French passport, so I get through pretty quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But I see the UK people spending a lot of time in the queues most of the time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The pandemic kept travel to a minimum, but following a surge in returning commuters and tourists, wait times increased to the point that Eurostar ca arrive 90 minutes before their train departs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But despite that, there are still bottlenecks at Eurostar stations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And it means the trains leaving first thing in the morning are never full.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Up to 250 seats empty every single day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Eurostar says it's hoping both the UK and the EU bring in more border police and install extra electronic gates to reduce check-in time at the station. Until that happens, commuters will have to think further ahead to secure a seat at the busiest times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Luke Hanrahan, Euronews, London.
